publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3294 Dr Richard Simpson: The Threat of Polio—That the Parliament notes that polio is still endemic in India, Pakistan, Afghanistan and Nigeria, where 1,600 cases were reported last year, and welcomes the investment of £100 million by the UK Government as part of a new fund of £435 million in partnership with the Bill and Melissa Gates Foundation, Rotary International and the German Government to be used to help eradicate polio through a range of initiatives including immunisation and additional supplemental vaccination of children in high risk areas.
S3M-3294 The Threat of Polio (lodged on 23 January 2009) Mike Pringle*
S3M-3294 The Threat of Polio (lodged on 23 January 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3294 The Threat of Polio (lodged on 23 January 2009) David Stewart*, Rhoda Grant*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3294 The Threat of Polio (lodged on 23 January 2009) Marlyn Glen*
